title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (National Survey of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (National Survey of 

Transport of Goods by Road) Order 2021. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 April 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited statistic (national survey transport good road) order 2021 (2) order come operation 1 april 2021

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“owner” means, in relation to a vehicle, the person by whom the vehicle is kept; 

“registered” means entered in the register established and maintained under 
section 131(1)(a) of the Finance Act 1992 (No. 9 of 1992); 

“Regulation” means Regulation 
Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 2012 1; 

(EU) No. 70/2012 of the European 

“relevant period” means the period between midnight on a Sunday immediately 
following the date on which notice of a direction under section 26 of the 
Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) made pursuant to the requirement prescribed 
under Article 4 is delivered and midnight on the following Sunday; 

“scrapped”, in relation to a vehicle, means a vehicle that has been discarded or 
deposited for appropriate treatment and recovery under the European Union 
(End-of-Life Vehicles) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 281 of 2014); 

“survey” means the National Survey of Transport of Goods by Road that is 
conducted by the Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining, 
including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation, information set 
out in the Schedule; 

“user” means, in relation to a vehicle, the person in possession of the vehicle 
under a hire-purchase agreement or a lease; 

“vehicle” means a registered goods road transport vehicle. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, other than 
where the context otherwise requires. 

1 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [163] 3

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 3. This Order applies to the following -
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to the following - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

a person who is the owner of a vehicle, 

a person who is the user of a vehicle, and 

a person who, immediately before it was scrapped, was the owner 
of a vehicle.
text_norm: 3 order applies following - (a) (b) (c) person owner vehicle person user vehicle person immediately scrapped owner vehicle

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 4. A requirement on persons to whom this Order applies to provide,
text_raw:
4. A requirement on persons to whom this Order applies to provide, 
annually in the period from April 2021 to March 2026 and for the purposes of 
the survey, information, the general nature of which is specified in the Schedule, 
in relation to the relevant period, is hereby prescribed. 

 
 
 4 [163]
text_norm: 4 requirement person order applies provide annually period april 2021 march 2026 purpose survey information general nature specified schedule relation relevant period hereby prescribed 4 163

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: In the case of the user of a vehicle other than one to which paragraph 3
text_raw:
2. 

In the case of the user of a vehicle other than one to which paragraph 3 
applies, the information specified in paragraphs 1(a)(iv) to (xii), as it relates to 
the vehicle concerned and specifying the relevant period concerned.

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: In the case of the owner of a vehicle that has been scrapped, confirmation
text_raw:
3. 

In the case of the owner of a vehicle that has been scrapped, confirmation 

of that fact. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4. 

Information on the time taken by the person concerned to complete the 
questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director General for the 
collection of the information referred to in paragraphs 1 to 3.
